required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Follow-up of Treatment Outcome, Quality of Life, Sexual Life and Partnership After Surgery of Endometriosis
clinical_study.official_title: Follow-up of Treatment Outcome, Quality of Life, Sexual Life and Partnership After Surgery of Endometriosis

brief_summary.textblock: Follow-up of treatment outcome, quality of life, sexual life and partnership after surgery of endometriosis by means of a questionnaire 1 year after surgical Intervention.

primary_outcome.measure: Endometriosis- associated symptoms assessed by questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: questionnaire asking for pain (with menstruation, with sexual intercourse, with defecation, with urination) on a Visual Analogue Scale (VAS), ranging from 0 = no pain to 10 = intolerable pain

primary_outcome.measure: Treatment outcome of surgery of endometriosis assessed by VAS questionnaire
primary_outcome.description: questionnaire asking for satisfaction with treatment outcome on a Visual Analogue Scale (VAS), ranging from 0 = absolutely dissatisfied to 10 = absolutely satisfied

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Quality of life assessed by questionnaire
primary_outcome.time_frame: before surgery of endometriosis and 1 year after surgery of endometriosis
primary_outcome.description: questionnaire asking for Quality of life on a Visual Analogue Scale (VAS), ranging from 0 = very bad to 10 = very good

primary_outcome.measure: Change in sexual life assessed by questionnaire
primary_outcome.time_frame: before surgery of endometriosis and 1 year after surgery of endometriosis
primary_outcome.description: questionnaire asking for Sexual life on a Visual Analogue Scale (VAS), ranging from 0 = absolutely dissatisfied to 10 = absolutely satisfied

primary_outcome.measure: Change in conduct of life assessed by questionnaire
primary_outcome.time_frame: before surgery of endometriosis and 1 year after surgery of endometriosis
primary_outcome.description: questionnaire asking for change in conduct of life (partnership, family, professional life, leisure activity, sportive activities) on a 6- item scale (ranging from "negative" to "positive")

primary_outcome.measure: Change in wish for child assessed by questionnaire
primary_outcome.time_frame: before surgery of endometriosis and 1 year after surgery of endometriosis
primary_outcome.description: questionnaire asking for change in wish for child on a 3- item scale (ranging from "yes" , "no answer" to "no")

secondary_outcome.measure: Follow-up of Treatment outcome of surgery of endometriosis assessed by interview
secondary_outcome.description: semi- structured interview to assess comments of study participants that are not depicted in the questionnaires

intervention.description: Online- Questionnaire investigating Follow-up of Treatment Outcome, Quality of Life, Sexual Life and Partnership After Surgery of Endometriosis
Semi- structured Interview investigating Follow-up of Treatment Outcome, Quality of Life, Sexual Life and Partnership After Surgery of Endometriosis

study_pop.textblock: women with endometriosis undergoing surgery of endometriosis at Frauenklinik of University Hospital Basel (from 01.01.2017 until 31.12.2017)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- surgery of endometriosis at Frauenklinik of University Hospital Basel (from 01.01.2017 until 31.12.2017)
- sufficient German language skills in order to be able to complete questionnaires
Exclusion Criteria:
- incapable of consenting
